post:
Host Expert provides dedicated servers, VDS, cloud backup in 2 locations in Romania starting in 2013. Host Expert brand belongs to Soft Expert Ltd.

All Host Expert dedicated servers include:

  • ILO access
  • Quality hardware
  • Fast and Helpful support
Location: Romania •HP DL160 Gen9 4LFF •Intel Xeon E5-2620v4 2.20 GHz (8 Cores / 16 Threads) •32GB RAM (2 x 16GB 2Rx4 PC4-24000P-R) •1 x 500GB HDD •1Gbps Uplink •Unmetered Bandwidth •1 IP •Free setup

Options:
•Hardware RAID
•DDoS Protection
•Up to 4x4TB HDD or 4x240 GB SSD or 4x480 GB SSD
•Additional IPs

74.97 EUR (use coupon: HB10 - recurrent discount. Discounted price will be in the invoice.)

Information:

We accept credit/debit card, PayPal and bank transfer.
